main event: A report of a brief flash observed by a witness on the ground and detected by radar.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for less than 3 seconds.
The report indicates it was a single object.
The report suggests it was a possible meteor, but lacks sufficient data.
This was a report with no prior correspondence from the witness.
The sighting was detected by both ground-based observation and radar.
witnesses: a witness on the ground and radar detection
